Container.Name: CodeProject.AI_ServerGPU
Container.Overview:
Fast, free, self-hosted Artificial Intelligence Server for any platform, any language. CodeProject.AI Server is a locally installed, self-hosted, fast, free and Open Source Artificial Intelligence server for any platform, any language. No off-device or out of network data transfer, no messing around with dependencies, and able to be used from any platform, any language. Runs as a Windows Service or a Docker container.
The Docker GPU version is specific to nVidia's CUDA enabled cards with compute capability >= 6.0 It may take some time to install as the image takes up a few GB of space!
One among many examples of use: it can be easily integrated in AgentDVR Video Surveillance Software for face or object recognition.
